# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt-group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5), transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5), and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner-mining-drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of burners and mining drills to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone-furnaces have the necessary ingredients before starting operations.
- Regularly check the ingredient levels of furnaces to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to disconnection from electric network
- Ensure that steam-engines are connected to the electric network before starting operations.
- Regularly check the connection status of steam-engines to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe-groups are not empty or full before starting operations.
- Regularly check the status of pipe-groups to avoid interruptions.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
